Articles.Content:
I tried changing my avatar with a screenshot when all of a sudden the size limitation smacked me in the face. That size is as small as Vatican city! How am I supposed to post screenshots up? Imgur does not work! I barely used this since it updated so yeah.

Edited December 4, 2015 by Spacetraindriver

Try resizing the image in an image editor, avatars are limited to 1MB afaik.

Screenshots in posts are not limited in size, you can insert full size images from imgur or other hosts.

Also: Moving this to the Kerbal Network, the forum about the forum.
